subject: [PATCH v2 3/4] mm: convert compaction to zone lock wrappers

reviews.author: Dmitry Ilvokhin
reviews.summary: No comments from the author in this thread.

2026-02-25.patch_summary: This patch series adds tracepoint instrumentation to zone lock acquire and release operations, following the mmap_lock tracepoint pattern. The implementation includes lightweight inline helpers that check whether tracing is enabled and call out-of-line helpers when active. When CONFIG_TRACING is disabled, these helpers compile to empty inline stubs.

reviews.author: Dmitry Ilvokhin
reviews.summary: Acknowledged Andrew's feedback on unnecessary abstraction, agreed to introduce two new helper functions in v3.

2026-02-26.patch_summary: Author is revising the patch to introduce two new helper functions instead of a single abstraction.
